events.message: Filed a claim after my vehicle was involved in a collision on the highway causing significant front-end damage.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to the nature of the car collision and related damages.
An agent was assigned to my case to assist with processing the insurance claim and to coordinate next steps.
Received confirmation that my claim for the car accident has been acknowledged and is now under review.
The insurance company requested additional documents including the police report and photos of the damaged vehicle.
Submitted all requested documents promptly, including the accident report, vehicle repair estimate, and driver's license.
The investigation process started to verify the details of the car accident and assess liability and damage.
Investigation was completed successfully, confirming the incident details and validating the reported damages.
Received a settlement proposal from the insurance company covering the repair costs and other related expenses.
Provided positive feedback on the claim process, appreciating the communication and timely updates received.
My claim was approved by the insurance company and the settlement offer was officially accepted.
Payment for the approved settlement was issued promptly and reflected in my bank account the same day.
The insurance claim has been closed successfully after payment, concluding the process to my satisfaction.
The claim record was archived for future reference and stored securely in the insurance companyâ€™s database.
